com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener

Class SelectListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener.SelectListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SelectListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Mouse listener that allows the user to select multiple labels by holding down any of the defined connect keys.
    PetriConfig
